passage_text: An Affair to Remember is a 1957 film starring Cary Grant and Deborah Kerr, and directed by Leo McCarey.
Cary Grant and Deborah Kerr co-star as a man and a woman whose shipboard romance inspires them to meet months later at the top of the Empire State Building.

You're probably thinking of Sleepless in Seattle with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan from 1993.
